org.jpedal.examples.viewer.objects

Class SignData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.objects.SignData

  • public class SignData
extends Object
    Models all the data you need in order to sign a Pdf document.

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Initialises and checks validity of files. This objects toString() method changes to reflect failures in validation in order for the user to be informed.
        Returns:
        True if the files are valid.
